00027   const Double_t Alignment::__degToRad=M_PI/180.;
00028 
00029   Alignment::Alignment() : 
00030     _stageOffset_x(0),
00031     _stageOffset_y(0)
00032   {
00033     // set transformation to id operation
00034     setTransformation(0,kDetector);
00035     setTransformation(0,kReference);
00036 
00037     //Fill the map with pointers to the various types of stage parameters
00038     _knownStageTypes["EmcStageDataBlock"] = &Alignment::handleEmcStage;
00039     _knownStageTypes["AhcSlowReadoutBlock"] = &Alignment::handleAhcStage;
00040 
00041   }

00047   void Alignment::moduleTypeChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col)
00048   {
00049     if (!col) {
00050       throw std::runtime_error("Alignment::moduleTypeChanged> Missing ModuleDescription conditions data. Sorry: don't know the folder name neither the time stamp.");
00051     }
00052     _moduleTypeList.clear();
00053     for (UInt_t element_i=0; element_i<(UInt_t) col->getNumberOfElements(); element_i++) {
00054       ModuleDescription a_module(col->getElementAt(element_i));
00055 
00056       // the type index is equal to the array index
00057       unsigned int module_type=a_module.getModuleType();
00058 
00059       if (module_type<_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00060         _moduleTypeList[module_type]=a_module;
00061       }
00062       else {
00063         if (module_type>_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00064 
00065           // the module type index is expected to be a small number
00066           // if the module type is an arbitrary number then it is stupid to use a vector.
00067           assert(module_type < 23);
00068 
00069           _moduleTypeList.resize(module_type);
00070         }
00071         _moduleTypeList.push_back(a_module);
00072       }
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076   void Alignment::moduleLocationChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00077     if (!col) {
00078       throw std::runtime_error("Alignment::moduleLocationChanged> Missing ModuleLocation conditions data. Sorry: don't know the folder name neither the time stamp.");
00079     }
00080     //std::cout << "Alignment::moduleLocationChanged>" << std::endl;
00081     _moduleLocationList.clear();
00082     //    _moduleIndex.clear();
00083 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00084     std::string since_string =  col->getParameters().getStringVal((lccd::DBSINCE).c_str());     
00085     LCTime since(static_cast<long64>(strtoll(since_string.c_str(),0,0)));
00086     std::string till_string =  col->getParameters().getStringVal((lccd::DBTILL).c_str());     
00087     LCTime till(static_cast<long64>(strtoll(till_string.c_str(),0,0)));
00088     std::string insertiontime_string =  col->getParameters().getStringVal((lccd::DBINSERTIONTIME).c_str());
00089     LCTime insertiontime(static_cast<long64>(strtoll(insertiontime_string.c_str(),0,0)));
00090 
00091     //std::cout << "Valid from: " << since.getDateString() << std::endl;
00092     //std::cout << "Valid to: " << till.getDateString() << std::endl;
00093     //std::cout << "Valid from: " << since_string << std::endl;
00094     //std::cout << "Valid to: " << till_string << std::endl;
00095     std::cout << "Valid from long: " << since.getDateString() << std::endl;
00096     std::cout << "Valid to long: " << till.getDateString()  << std::endl;
00097     std::cout << "Insertion time: " << insertiontime.getDateString() << std::endl; 
00098     std::cout << "Modulelocations Elements: " << col->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl; 
00099 #endif
00100     for (UInt_t element_i=0; element_i<(UInt_t) col->getNumberOfElements(); element_i++) {
00101       ModuleLocation location(col->getElementAt(element_i));
00102 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00103       std::cout << "ModuleLocation Changed x pos: " << location.getX() << std::endl;
00104       std::cout << "ModuleLocation Changed y pos: " << location.getY() << std::endl;
00105 #endif
00106       _moduleLocationList.push_back(make_pair(UINT_MAX,location));
00107       //_moduleIndex.insert(make_pair(location.getCellIndexOffset(),static_cast<UInt_t>(_moduleLocationList.size()-1)));
00108     }
00109   }

00111   void Alignment::setTransformation(lcio::LCCollection* col, ETransformation transformation_type)
00112   {
00113     if (!col) {
00114       // if the collection is missing, assume an untransformed detector
00115       for (UInt_t i=0; i<3; i++) {
00116         _detectorPos[transformation_type][i]=0;
00117       }
00118       _detectorRotationX0[transformation_type]=0;
00119       _detectorRotationZ0[transformation_type]=0;
00120       _detectorAngleZX[transformation_type]=0;
00121     }
00122     else if (col->getNumberOfElements()==1) {
00123       try {
00124 
00125         CALICE::DetectorTransformation transformation(col->getElementAt(0));
00126 
00127         if(transformation_type == kDetector) {
00128           //The sign of the stage correction is chosen according to the observations during 2006 running
00129           //_detectorPos[transformation_type][0]=transformation.getDetectorX0()-_stageOffset_x;
00130           //_detectorPos[transformation_type][1]=transformation.getDetectorY0()+_stageOffset_y;
00131           _detectorPos[transformation_type][0]=transformation.getDetectorX0()-_stageOffset_x;
00132           _detectorPos[transformation_type][1]=transformation.getDetectorY0()-_stageOffset_y;
00133 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG         
00134           std::cout << " Detector Transformation X: " <<  transformation.getDetectorX0() << std::endl;
00135           std::cout << " Detector Transformation Y: " <<  transformation.getDetectorY0() << std::endl;
00136           
00137           std::cout << " Detector Transformation XStand: " <<  _stageOffset_x << std::endl;
00138           std::cout << " Detector Transformation YStand: " <<  _stageOffset_y << std::endl;
00139 #endif
00140         }
00141         else {
00142           _detectorPos[transformation_type][0]=transformation.getDetectorX0();
00143           _detectorPos[transformation_type][1]=transformation.getDetectorY0();
00144         }
00145         _detectorPos[transformation_type][2]=transformation.getDetectorZ0();
00146         _detectorAngleZX[transformation_type]=transformation.getDetectorAngleZX() *__degToRad ;
00147         _detectorRotationX0[transformation_type]=transformation.getDetectorRotationX0();
00148         _detectorRotationZ0[transformation_type]=transformation.getDetectorRotationZ0();
00149         
00150       }
00151       catch (lcio::Exception &err) {
00152         // backward compatibility:
00153         CALICE::ExperimentalSetup setup(col->getElementAt(0));
00154         _detectorPos[transformation_type][0]=setup.getDetectorX0();
00155         _detectorPos[transformation_type][1]=setup.getDetectorY0();
00156         _detectorPos[transformation_type][2]=setup.getDetectorZ0();
00157         _detectorAngleZX[transformation_type]=setup.getDetectorAngleZX() *__degToRad ;
00158         _detectorRotationX0[transformation_type]=setup.getDetectorRotationX0();
00159         _detectorRotationZ0[transformation_type]=setup.getDetectorRotationZ0();
00160       }
00161     }
00162     else {
00163       std::stringstream message;
00164       message << "Alignment::setTransformation> Expecting collection with one Transformation object "
00165                  "but got a collection with " << col->getNumberOfElements() << " elements." ;
00166       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00167     }
00168     calculateEffectiveTransformation();
00169   }
00170 
00171   void Alignment::calculateEffectiveTransformation() {
00172     // calculate an effective translation and rotation angle 
00173     // such that : x_prime = Rot(alpha) x   + x_trans.
00174     // Note, the rotation axis is the y-axis, thus the y-component is only translated.
00175 
00176     // If the reference and the transformation are bitwise identical then do not rotate:
00177     if (_detectorAngleZX[kDetector]==_detectorAngleZX[kReference]) {
00178 
00179       _detectorAngleZX[kEffective]=0.;
00180       _detectorAngleZXSin=0.;
00181       _detectorAngleZXCos=1.;
00182 
00183     }
00184     else {
00185       _detectorAngleZX[kEffective]=_detectorAngleZX[kDetector]-_detectorAngleZX[kReference];
00186       _detectorAngleZXSin=sin(_detectorAngleZX[kEffective]);
00187       _detectorAngleZXCos=cos(_detectorAngleZX[kEffective]);
00188     }
00189 
00190     // inverse rotation :
00191     double c =   cos(_detectorAngleZX[kReference]);
00192     double s =   sin(_detectorAngleZX[kReference]);
00193 
00194     _detectorRotationX0[kEffective]=0;
00195     _detectorRotationZ0[kEffective]=0;
00196 
00197     double rel_pos_x =  _detectorPos[kDetector][0]+_detectorRotationX0[kDetector]
00198                       - _detectorPos[kReference][0]-_detectorRotationX0[kReference];
00199 
00200     double rel_pos_z =  _detectorPos[kDetector][2]+_detectorRotationZ0[kDetector]
00201                       - _detectorPos[kReference][2]-_detectorRotationZ0[kReference];
00202 
00203     _detectorPos[kEffective][0] = 
00204        _detectorRotationX0[kReference]
00205       + c * rel_pos_x + s * rel_pos_z
00206       - _detectorAngleZXCos * _detectorRotationX0[kDetector] 
00207       - _detectorAngleZXSin * _detectorRotationZ0[kDetector];
00208 
00209     _detectorPos[kEffective][1] = _detectorPos[kDetector][1] - _detectorPos[kReference][1];
00210 
00211     _detectorPos[kEffective][2] = 
00212        _detectorRotationZ0[kReference]
00213       - s * rel_pos_x + c * rel_pos_z
00214       + _detectorAngleZXSin * _detectorRotationX0[kDetector] 
00215       - _detectorAngleZXCos * _detectorRotationZ0[kDetector];
00216   }

00218   void Alignment::stagePositionChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00219     std::map<std::string,StageChangeHandleFunc_t>::iterator iter=_knownStageTypes.find(col->getParameters().getStringVal("TypeName")); 
00220     if(iter != _knownStageTypes.end()) {StageChangeHandleFunc_t aFunc = iter->second;
00221     (this->*aFunc)(col);} 
00222     {}
00223 
00224     std::cout  << "Number of Elements: " << col->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
00225  }

00227   void Alignment::handleEmcStage(LCCollection* col) {
00228     std::cout << "In handle EmcStage" << std::endl;
00229     if(col) { 
00230        EmcStageDataBlock emcStgDat(col->getElementAt(0));
00231        _stageOffset_x = static_cast<float>(emcStgDat.getXStandPosition()*0.1);
00232        _stageOffset_y = static_cast<float>(emcStgDat.getYStandPosition()*0.1);
00233        std::cout << " xStandPosition/mm: " <<  _stageOffset_x << std::endl;
00234        std::cout << " yStandPosition/mm: " <<  _stageOffset_y << std::endl;
00235        emcStgDat.print(std::cout);
00236 
00237     } 
00238 
00239   }
00240 
00241   void Alignment::handleAhcStage(LCCollection* col) {
00242     std::cout << "In handle AhcStage" << std::endl;
00243     if(col) { 
00244       AhcSlowReadoutBlock ahcSroDat(col->getElementAt(0)); 
00245       _stageOffset_x = static_cast<float>(ahcSroDat.get_xPosition_mm());
00246       _stageOffset_y = static_cast<float>(ahcSroDat.get_xPosition_mm());
00247       std::cout << "Ahc: Movable stage position x[mm]: " << ahcSroDat.get_xPosition_mm() << std::endl;
00248       std::cout << "Ahc: Movable stage position y[mm]: " << ahcSroDat.get_yPosition_mm() << std::endl;
00249       ahcSroDat.print(std::cout);
00250     } 
00251 
00252   }
